fields.name: year
fields.title: Year
fields.description: This tab / field in the template is only populated if there are no question period notes for the reporting period. This field should be populated with the year of the reporting period.

fields.name: reporting_period
fields.title: Reporting Period
fields.description: This tab / field in the template is only populated if there are no briefing notes for the reporting period. This field should be populated with the reporting period.
